title: Tiny Black Pixels In Game
body:
What are these tiny black pixels? This happened sometime after I overclocked my graphics card and they only appear in game.
https://imgur.com/13aloa6

GPU specs:
https://imgur.com/I3ZD9YH

replies.body: Having same issue with gtx 1060 and a brand new monitor that doesn't have the issue is any other game. My black pixels looked the same except there were two sets of them corresponding on the top right and top left of the screen respectively.
I am having the same issue and my graphic driver is up to date.
I'm having the same issue.. Amd 7870 ghz edition
I'm having the same exact issue and i'm using a 780 ti :/
I updated my graphics card driver and they seem to be gone for now try that.
